rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: According to projections released on Tuesday by pork and poultry lobby ABPA, Brazil will produce up to 14.9 million tons of chicken meat through the end of this year and up to 15.35 million tons in 2024.

rationale: The segment uses factual verbs like 'released' and 'will produce', not high-potency verbs.

rationale: The segment discusses production/trade metrics, which are excluded from Q3.
